Uses of Class
org.jgrapes.webcon.base.events.ConsoleCommand

  • Packages that use ConsoleCommand 
    Package Description
    org.jgrapes.webcon.base
    Provides the components for building a portal based on the core, io and http packages.
    org.jgrapes.webcon.base.events
    The events used by the portal related components.
    org.jgrapes.webcon.base.freemarker
    Classes for implementing a freemarker based portlet.

      Subclasses of ConsoleCommand in org.jgrapes.webcon.base.events 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AddComponentType
      Adds a portlet type with its global resources (JavaScript and/or CSS) to the portal page.
      class  AddPageResources
      Adds <link .../>, <style>...</style> or <script ...></script> nodes to the portal’s <head> node on behalf of components that provide such resources.
      class  DeleteComponent
      A notification (as defined by the JSON RPC specification) to be sent to the portlet view (the browser).
      class  DisplayNotification
      Causes a notification to be display on the top of the portal page.
      class  LastConsoleLayout
      Sent by the server to the browser in response to ConsolePrepared (see this event’s description for details).
      class  NotifyPortletView
      A notification (as defined by the JSON RPC specification) to be sent to the portlet view (the browser).
      class  RenderComponent
      A base class for portal rendering.
      class  SimpleConsoleCommand
      A ConsoleCommand created directly from the JSON RPC method name and parameters.
